text: Yalla kinni kitab marak koroosite mara (yahuuduk bani-nadiir kinnuk) naharsi koboxul le dabooqak dabboh teyyeeqem, Moominiiney isin usun sinni kalqootak xixxibaane luk yawqoonuwaanam makkalitton, kaadu usun sinni kalqoota Yallih digaalá sinnek waaselem yekkelen. Tokkel Yalli digaalá usun kak akkaluk sugeween kabuk keenit baahe, kaadu ken sorkocobbaxittet conxo qide, usun sinni qarwa sinni gabaa kee yeemeneh yan marih gabat baysaanaah yaggilen, toysa sorkocobbaxi inti le maraw isin amahal kaskassoowa mara tika
